ECS272 Homework 2

Yuhan Huang

Visualization 1: dynamic scatter plot shows the popularity metrics of the top 30 songs for each year from 1920; use the dropdown list to filter by years. Visualization 2: Spider chart illustrating different metrics for the 4 most popular song on Spotify since 1920; hover the cursor on data to highlight. Visualization 3: An overview time series of mean value of song metrics through the year; use the dropdown list to select the metric.
